title: How to make an American quilt
creator_credit: Amblin Entertainment, Sarah Pillsbury, Midge Sanford and Jocelyn Moorhouse
brief_description: Winona Ryder shines in this deeply moving and touchingly funny story of a Berkeley graduate student Finn (Ryder) who spends the summer at the home of her sparring Grandmother (Anne Bancroft) and great aunt (Ellyn Burstyn). Their house is a quiet haven where she intends to finish her latest thesis and think over a marriage proposal. This beautifully filmed tale brings unbridled passion, true love, betrayal, joy and heartbreak vividly to life in a captivating cinematic tapestry that celebrates finding your way and following your heart. Based on the novel by Whitney Otto.
